website_summaries.verdict: Extra large archway that you can actually stand under.
pros: Kit includes poles, weighted bases, balloon clips, and 2 air pumps
Simply fill the bases with sand or water to keep archway in place
cons: For outdoor use you may need additional string reinforcements, especially if it's windy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stand on it’s own!
customer_reviews.text: This product would not stand on it owns. I had to purchase additional material and have someone fabricate supports in order to get it to stand. very frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew how many balloons to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. Would have been great if it would’ve said somewhere how many balloons were needed to fill the arch. We used 138 balloons, probably could’ve held another 60+.
customer_reviews.author: C Weidman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my God Mothets 90th Birthday Celebration And instantly I loved it it was so easy and I love the star rings made me go faster!!!! This is a exciting Product
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The arch initially was very easy to set up out of the box. However, when loaded with balloons it began to tip over and come apart at each seam. There is an elastic string connecting all pieces so that the arch remains connected but the seams still pop. It was so frustrating. I even placed the enclosed duct tape at each seam and it still popped after 3 hours of reattaching balloons, rearranging the arch, I left if flat as a “floating” garland. I’d had high hopes but I would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Glynn

customer_reviews.title: Easy easy assembly. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: This. I can't even say enough how much I love making this! You really don't need instructions but if you did they're extremely easy to understand. You get 2 pumps with it, the rope to anchor it down, clips for the anchors, tape, steaks, and 2 size balloon measures. Its definitely worth the price. I would suggest sand in the base and not water but with the anchors it was great. Huge hit for our sons party and we'll be using for other events !(we didn't put enough balloons and didn't have time to put them on before the party started. But it comes with way more than enough clips to fill the whole thing 2 times over).
customer_reviews.author: M Bernier

customer_reviews.title: Easily Set up
customer_reviews.text: Set up is easy, a few things to remember though. You need about 100 more balloons than you think you do, I believe we used 250 and it was nice and full. As other reviewers said it stands up on it's own but tends to get "weighed down" by the balloon weight so make sure you put weights on either side of the stands so it stands up straight! otherwise its a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but worrisome malfunction
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy this was to assemble and create a great looking balloon arch for our event. I was bragging about what a great purchase and all of the other events we would be able to use it for but when we began to disassemble, the elastic holding the posts together snapped. We were able to hold the connections together but I am concerned that this malfunction will render the arch unusable in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrenceingram

customer_reviews.title: Fun party addition!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a party and it worked perfectly without any issues! Came with everything I needed except for the balloons themselves. It even included a smaller box you build that has precut holes to measure the balloons! I had used it indoors with water in the bases and didn’t have to anchor it down at all and it even looked great the next day! Can’t wait to use it again! It took about 2 hrs to do with 37 of the rings. I definitely recommend buying an electric air pump versus the hand ones it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Jerred

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a wedding
customer_reviews.text: My Husband and I received the arch in 2 days. We set it up in about an hour more or less. Love the star rings it came with. And extras. My Husband loved the tie pieces. I personally think that some of the errors that people were having problems with wasnt because of the kit. It was definitely the operator error. Love the kit. If anything happens to this we would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Barton

customer_reviews.title: Love this, worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to put together as a team, we’ve used it twice already and love it every time. I’ve always had another person helping me so I can’t speak to how easy/difficult it is to assemble alone. I’ve also only used it inside, but it has good stands on the ends. We use about 160-200 balloons and it looks AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Micayla

customer_reviews.title: It is not safe.
customer_reviews.text: One time use. They use a fiber glass material. And when you use it and disassemble it, the stick or the arc part will be broken and shuttered into pieces. They will go inside your skin when you touch it. We returned and had our refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jayreon

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for a kindergarten photo booth. It was set up the day before and I was pleasantly surprised to see it almost intact the following day. I was concerned about it falling over but it was not a problem at all. It worked great for an indoor classroom party, I can’t say much about outdoor use. I was under the impression that the height could be adjusted by removing some of the parts but it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS ARCHES WOULD HAVE LOVED TO BE ABLE TO FOLD AT BOTTOM AND MAKE SMALLER IF NEEDED BUT DONT FIT FOLDED ON THE PIPES PROVIDED BUT OTHERWISE GREAT ARCH
customer_reviews.author: Sandra F.

customer_reviews.title: Only last for one event
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a wedding decoration. When I took it down after wedding, the rod inside broken in a few different places like splinters poking into my hands. For the price, it should serve more than one time use. And when it setup, it wobbled a little. We need to keep checking on it to avoid leaning over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddicted

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it to arch
customer_reviews.text: We just couldn't figure out how to keep all of the little clear plastic pieces together to make an arch. However, we've used it several time to make balloon columns and that has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Elle C

customer_reviews.title: I guess I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a job bbq and the box it came in looked like it was tortured before it got to me. When I filled it up with water it leaked everywhere. The poles didn’t stay in even when I put cardboard in it. I added balloons which caused it to tip over and fall out even though I used the duct tape they sent to keep it in place this was a total disaster I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty By Rena

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Such an easy thing to use. Unlike some reviews, I did receive instructions and they were very simple. This can easily fit 100+ balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties, weddings,  or prom
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up but does take a couple people. Really suggest a powered air pump though to save time. We used the ones it came with it just takes longer. Everyone was impressed with it once it was done.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Politte

customer_reviews.title: Quality balloon arch
customer_reviews.text: The arch was eay to assemble and if you have it outside it must be tied to something to keep it from blowing over. But, this kit comes with everything you need to secure and stake it outdoors. It was a spectacular decoration for our party. It did take a lot of time to blow up the 200 balloons and our balloons started popping in the mid day sun. But, overall, this was a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph F. Marvenko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and sturdy arch! Recommend this arch to all balloon business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Took about 150 balloons. It tips over when full so we had to tie the top to a tree to keep it still but otherwise it was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bibiana

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This balloon arch is super cute, and definitely the highlight of the room. All of the pictures turned out cute. We can use it for every event now!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The balloon arch looked promising but when I went to assemble a test run four days before my event, I found that some parts were broken. The stretchy cord that holds the poles together was broken so the entire arch was uses. It would not stand up. Now I'm not sure that I can get another one in time for the event. Really disappointed with the quality of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The arch was relatively easy to assemble but we needed many hands to set up so it didn't fall over! It's a way easier method than last year!
customer_reviews.author: DoxieLover

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shower Balloon Arch
customer_reviews.text: This was a show stopper. Most thought professionals set it up. Well we were the stars of the show. Excellent product. Baby’ shower decor was outstanding with this arch.
customer_reviews.author: MBR🌹

customer_reviews.title: Takes some effort but well worth it especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Added string lights to this arch and it turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: nfun381

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to put up.
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to put up. Only issue we had was that it got up to 96 degrees that day so we had a 100 balloon salute about every 5 min lol. Definitely loved it and it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: mr&mrsC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with it. First time using something like this. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jessbecreative

customer_reviews.title: Arch
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble saved a lot of time when creating and arch. However not the steady even with the water in the base I will be filling with sand the next time. Overall nice product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balloon arch
customer_reviews.text: Was a great product definitely reusable, but the little round peace’s that the balloons hook onto may go missing, so definitely buy extra
customer_reviews.author: Gina Apaisa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Balloon pumps both fell apart the elastic on the sticks for arch ripped off hard flex and the plastic or metal parts had so much residue I had a bunch of pricks on both my hands! Ouch!!
customer_reviews.author: yessy's

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed It! Huge
customer_reviews.text: Once the balloons were blown up, it was quick to figure out. Everyone enjoyed it’s amazing size!! Picture was from 8/2019.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out how to set it up it works great. Defiantly follow the instructions and hints that come in the package. We are very happy. We use this for school events.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This arch set was very easy to setup. Thought about paying someone to doit, but cost way to much and this was so easy to step. Saved ourselves over $300 by doing it ourselves
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Carter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Not sure how durable it is. We took it down the next day. It did great for one day at leadr
customer_reviews.author: Chloe45

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a school event but it worked out so well that the school asked to use it for two other assemblies after. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: During my daughters graduation party this thing snapped and broke! Needless to say- not my best purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Standridge

customer_reviews.title: They send extra stuff such as a manual balloon pump
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble absolutely in love with it I was able to create a baloon arch in about 40 mins Looks smaller on the picture because I took out 2 sticks out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy for a firs timer to use the only difficulty was using it outside but that’s because of the wind just make sure it it is strapped down good!
customer_reviews.author: meghan Portugal

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: it is very easy to assemble but the arch does not stay in place... would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: It kept falling apart and couldn’t get it to stand straight. The balloon arch was sideways the entire time it was embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: itzzi

customer_reviews.title: Recommendable and price is reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Loved it !! So much better than I expected the bases are pretty big. The assembly is also easy the outcome was amazing! I used this for work and planning to use it on my upcoming babyshower
customer_reviews.author: m Torres 84

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The bases are very lightweight so i had to add some sand weights to help it stand after balloons, it took about 200 12 inch balloons filled up to 9inches for it to be nice and full
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: Major bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter’s first birthday. It was easy and looked amazing. It will be so great to have for many events to come. Guests thought we spent hundreds.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Parties
customer_reviews.text: We made a balloon arch for our Halloween Party this year and it was perfect! We did run out of Purple Balloons but it still looked great. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, lots of extra rings and clips and looks very professional
customer_reviews.author: Mahvee

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble and got it on time
customer_reviews.text: Arch was delivered on time. Easy assemble. Would order this product again
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Will definitely use again. We used 140 balloons and that was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Everything comes as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Product is factory as described. Very easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: ixelduenez

customer_reviews.title: 29th Birthday
customer_reviews.text: Loved the flexibility and convenience of the products and delivery. I used it for my daughter visiting in town for her 29th birthday, she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tweety

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. It was easy to assemble and looked fantastic. We got so many compliments on our balloon arch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DeElf Quick & Easy Balloon Arch Kit for Birthday, Event Planning, Wedding Event Party Decoration
product_meta.description:
Flavor:Balloon ArchYou Can Become a Balloon Arch Expert without Any Training - Quick, Easy, and Professional Looking 

 Building a balloon arch becomes so much popular in different party events, and usually it can receive a lot of compliments for your professional looking balloon arch. The balloon arch that you will build looks very professional that no one can believe you are NOT an balloon expert. Imagine how it will be when every appraise your balloon arch art work. Building one balloon arch is very easy, and it takes about 5 minutes to set up the balloon arch frame. Then, you can start adding balloons with your designed patterns. 

Product Specification:  * Balloon Arch Size: 8 feet height and 11 feet width 
 * Color： White
 * Free Accessories: 50 balloon rings, 2 handheld air pumps
 * Package Include: 2 x large balloon bases; 2 x tubes for balloon arch bases; 10 poles connected with string; 50 balloon rings; 2 handheld random colored air pumps

 Try this balloon arch for your party or event planning. Take home with you!
feature_bullets: Perfect Size Balloon Arch Size - 8 feet by 11 feet, great fit for indoor house
Easy to Assemble and Disassemble - It takes no more than 5 minutes to set up the balloon arch frame from scratch
Free Accessories - 50 Free balloon rings, 2 free balloon random colored air pumps with a retail box that can be turned into balloon sizers to create perfect balloon arch
Unlimited Usage & DIY Ideas - This balloon arch kit can be reuse for unlimited times for all your parties in the future
Perfect for Indoor Use - We highly recommend this to be used in indoor. For outdoor, you need a rope to secure the balloon arch.
